S:log-item.D:comment: MAHOUT-449 - NegativeBinomial needs fixing Added test cases for NegativeBinomial and underlying integrals like incompleteBeta. Added log case for Gamma.beta(alpha, beta) computation Tested Gamma.gamma, Gamma.incompleteBeta, Improved error messages and comments Normalized variable names for Gamma distribution Tested Gamma.pdf and cdf Fixed confused conventions in NegativeBinomial Added google guava library to dependencies
